title: New Skin ideas?

embed.description: was previously the ruler of above all Ascended, some of which later became Darkin. "We had another name once... Now, we are Darkin." The Darkin are stated to be a collection of sentient weapons by Eduard Santangelo and , of which only three have been revealed in modern times so far.

body:
I was playing Aatrox the other day and heard him say a line I haven't heard before, something about another name before Darkin. So I read the lore to see what that was about and saw some pictures I thought would make some cool skins for Darkin champs. Like "prime time" Darkin, when they where in there glory days or such. I think it would just make some cool skins and can add to Kayn and Aatrox as they don't have many skins.

(I got this idea from the history tab on the Vision of the Darkin pictures)
